description: This file defines and exports rate limiting middleware functions for different operation types (authentication, writing, reading) in an Express.js server. It utilizes the 'express-rate-limit' library to configure rate limits and customizes messages for each limiter.

methods.name: authLimiter
methods.description: Rate limiting middleware for authentication operations such as signup and login, restricting to 5 requests per 15 minutes.

methods.name: writeLimiter
methods.description: Rate limiting middleware for write operations (POST, PUT, DELETE), restricting to 30 requests per minute using environment variable for window size.

methods.name: readLimiter
methods.description: Rate limiting middleware for read operations (GET), allowing 100 requests per minute.
